artifacts.title: If the NFC label is applied at outer side of the housing and the rating plate position is not exposed to jobsite conditions the standard NFC label 18x18mm standard (ECtr #5326191) shall be used, which is valid for positions like in the battery interface, i
artifacts.description: If the NFC label is applied at outer side of the housing and the rating plate position is not exposed to jobsite conditions the standard NFC label 18x18mm standard (ECtr #5326191) shall be used, which is valid for positions like in the battery interface, inside D-handle under the precondition that there is enough space for this label.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall record its total 'active time'. See HRID 338.
artifacts.description: The <product> shall record its total 'active time'. See HRID 338.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: The <product> shall record its total 'active time'. See HRID 338.

artifacts.title: If the <product> has a motor, 'active time' is defined as the time the motor is turning.
artifacts.description: If the <product> has a motor, 'active time' is defined as the time the motor is turning.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: If the <product> has a motor, 'active time' is defined as the time the motor is turning.

artifacts.title: If the <product> has no motor, 'active time' is defined as the time the <product> has been active.
artifacts.description: If the <product> has no motor, 'active time' is defined as the time the <product> has been active.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: If the <product> has no motor, 'active time' is defined as the time the <product> has been active.

artifacts.title: If the <product> has no motor and there is no clear distinction between 'active time' and 'inactive time', this is simply the time the tool electronics has been powered and awake.
artifacts.description: If the <product> has no motor and there is no clear distinction between 'active time' and 'inactive time', this is simply the time the tool electronics has been powered and awake.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: If the <product> has no motor and there is no clear distinction between 'active time' and 'inactive time', this is simply the time the tool electronics has been powered and awake.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall record its 'idle time'. This is the time the tool is powered on but not in use. See HRID 340.
artifacts.description: The <product> shall record its 'idle time'. This is the time the tool is powered on but not in use. See HRID 340.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: The <product> shall record its 'idle time'. This is the time the tool is powered on but not in use. See HRID 340.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall record the number of times it has been switched on. This is when the tool becomes powered on after being in an unpowered state. See HRID 341.
artifacts.description: The <product> shall record the number of times it has been switched on. This is when the tool becomes powered on after being in an unpowered state. See HRID 341.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: The <product> shall record the number of times it has been switched on. This is when the tool becomes powered on after being in an unpowered state. See HRID 341.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall record the number of applications it has performed. See HRID 339.
artifacts.description: The <product> shall record the number of applications it has performed. See HRID 339.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: The <product> shall record the number of applications it has performed. See HRID 339.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall follow the Hilti standard Tool ID format, defined as:
artifacts.description:
The <product> shall follow the Hilti standard Tool ID format, defined as:

• Serial number (for encoding and description, see HRID 328)

• VFE (see HRID 329)

• FFE (see HRID 330)

• Version Information (see HRID 426)
artifacts.primary_text_html_local:
The <product> shall follow the Hilti standard Tool ID format, defined as:

• Serial number (for encoding and description, see HRID 328)

• VFE (see HRID 329)

• FFE (see HRID 330)

• Version Information (see HRID 426)

artifacts.title: The <product> shall be able to provide all four numbers bundled together as a binary form of the Thing ID that the Hilti Cloud uses to identify the <product>. See HRID 456.
artifacts.description: The <product> shall be able to provide all four numbers bundled together as a binary form of the Thing ID that the Hilti Cloud uses to identify the <product>. See HRID 456.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: The <product> shall be able to provide all four numbers bundled together as a binary form of the Thing ID that the Hilti Cloud uses to identify the <product>. See HRID 456.

artifacts.title: For interoperability with the Hilti Cloud, the <product> should additionally store its Tool ID in a 32 byte string (see HRID 331). This is the Thing ID that the Cloud can use to uniquely identify the <product>.
artifacts.description: For interoperability with the Hilti Cloud, the <product> should additionally store its Tool ID in a 32 byte string (see HRID 331). This is the Thing ID that the Cloud can use to uniquely identify the <product>.
artifacts.primary_text_html_local: For interoperability with the Hilti Cloud, the <product> should additionally store its Tool ID in a 32 byte string (see HRID 331). This is the Thing ID that the Cloud can use to uniquely identify the <product>.

artifacts.title: The <product> electronics shall provide the date this electronics component was last programmed (see HRID 271, HRID 689) This is first written as the date at which the electronics was programmed at production.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall be able to respond to queries whether it is currently running, idle, waiting for an operator action, in an error state, or in a testing state. See HRID 362.

artifacts.title: The <product> shall be able to respond to queries on its main function. This is a code in an enumeration: 1 = breaker, 2 = heavy breaker, 3 = saw, etc. (see HRID 363).

artifacts.title: One of the following NFC tags shall be used for the product:
artifacts.description:
One of the following NFC tags shall be used for the product:

2166621 - NFC label 25x25mm long pitch robust

2166577 - NFC label 25x25mm robust

2166578 - NFC label 18x18mm standard

2166620 - NFC label 25x25mm on-metal
artifacts.primary_text_html_local:
One of the following NFC tags shall be used for the product:

2166621 - NFC label 25x25mm long pitch robust

2166577 - NFC label 25x25mm robust

2166578 - NFC label 18x18mm standard

2166620 - NFC label 25x25mm on-metal

artifacts.title: The rating plate shall have one of the following dimensions:
artifacts.description:
The rating plate shall have one of the following dimensions:

23x28/25x50/35x30/50x38/60x40mm
